titles.title: Believing Those Things Which Are Not Seen

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Believing those things which are not seen,
Let us boldly enter in.
Not by the eye, nor by the ear,
But by the Word of Truth I've given.
Chorus:
Walk boldly believing this,
If ye be otherwise,
I shall reveal it unto thee.
Believing those things which are not seen,
Enter in.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ye are the Lily of the valley,
Being clothed without hands.
Ye are the trees, plantings of the Lord,
Against whom no enemy shall stand.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ye are holy, without blame
Before me in love.
Called by me, to my glory,
I descend like a dove.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Ye are the temple of the Lord,
Now I have a dwelling place.
I am Thy Life, ye are my glory.
Ye shall see me face to face.
